description:
This is first part of a 3.5 hour loop with Redstreak Camp Ground Trail being the second half of the loop. 
The trail is quite easy but there are a lot of hills. The first 30 minutes is all uphill, then downhill for about 45 minutes, then another uphill for 15 minutes.
directions:
Park the car by Radium Hot Springs Pools (N 50.38.094, W 116.02.479). You don't need a National Park Pass to park there as of spring 2005.
Trail head is North West corner of the North parking lot.
title: Juniper Trail
